name: AHA (alpha hydroxy acid)
effects: water-soluble; targets signs of ageing and skin damage; renews skin radiance; exfoliates the top layer of the skin's surface; improves skin texture

name: BHA (beta hydroxy acid)
effects: oil-soluble; exfoliates below the skin's surface; unclogs pores; anti-inflammatory and anti-bacterial properties

name: PHA (poly hydroxy acid)
effects: exfoliates gently, with less irritation; restores the healthy moisture barrier

name: retinol
effects: anti-aging;boosts collagen production; brightens dark spots; reduces the look of fine lines and wrinkles

name: hyaluronic acid
effects: naturally present in the skin; its concentrations increase when there is damage in need of repair (e.g. dry lips); binds to water to help retain moisture; has antibacterial properties

name: salicylic acid
effects: decongests pores; dissolves sebum for clearer, breakout-free skin; anti-inflammatory; helps reduce existing acne

name: glycolic acid
effects: lightens hyperpigmentation/sun damage; softens fine lines and wrinkles; dissolves dead skin; smoothes texture; stimulates collagen production; brightens the skin

name: niancinamide
effects: fades hyperpigmentation; reduces the appearance of wrinkles; minimises pores; regulates sebum production; strenghtens the skin's moisture barrier

name: vitamin C
effects: antioxidant protection; shields skin from age-accelerating free radicals; encourages collagen production; firms skin; reduces appearance of wrinkles; fades hyperpigmentation and dark spots

name: vitamin E
effects: moisturizes skin, smoothes and softens skin cells; protects skin from free radicals that cause premature ageing

name: panthenol
effects: prevents trans-epidermal water loss; supports a healthy moisture barrier

name: clay
effects: extremely absorbent; instantly, but temporarily minimises the appearance of pores; mattifies oily skin; may help reduce frequency of breakouts

name: argan oil
effects: has moisturizing abilities that can be used on skin, hair and cuticles

name: benzoyl peroxide
effects: kills any acne-causing bacteria; gets rid of excess oil and dead skin cells
